792b051d-421b-4aef-bf53-beda69f57af1.description:
Receives the path of the file to rename.

Example:
"/home/user1/dir1/foo.txt"

(To keep the application portable use "/" as path separator.)
792b051d-421b-4aef-bf53-beda69f57af1.name: source path

6d745d7e-8ad3-424d-9ab6-17f05f2feee5.description:
Receives the desired new file name.

Example:
"bar.txt"
6d745d7e-8ad3-424d-9ab6-17f05f2feee5.name: new name

80086718-d928-4b93-aba9-13e6bf1c03b8.name: bounced

d500d1f6-20b9-4704-9c92-52a253ee2862.name: renamed

db50d76f-e0bc-4d56-a919-90167da777c9.name: error

name: io/file/File renamer
